Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller

Class User

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.User
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class User extends Object implements Runnable
The entity containing the tcp connection socket of the client connected to the game server and its input and output streams.
Author:
Riccardo Milici, Riccardo Motta, Matteo Negro

  • Constructor Details

    • User

      public User(Socket socket, Server server) throws IOException
      Class constructor. Creates an instance of the class, containing the username, tcp socket and its input and output streams.
      Parameters:
      socket - The user's tcp socket, used to communicate with the game server throw the network.
      server - The main server instance.
      Throws:
      IOException - Thrown if an error occurs during the input and output streams' opening.

  • Method Details

    • getUsername

      public String getUsername()
      Returns the name associated to the user.
      Returns:
      username attribute.

    • getGameController

      public GameController getGameController()
      Returns the current GameController instance.
      Returns:
      The gameController attribute.

    • run

      public void run()
      Every time checks if the user is online and when receives a command, processes it.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable

    • getCommand

      private com.google.gson.JsonObject getCommand() throws IOException
      Reads the incoming message from the tcp socket.
      Returns:
      A JsonObject containing the command received.
      Throws:
      IOException - Thrown if an error occurs during the socket input stream read.

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage(com.google.gson.JsonObject command)
      Sends a message to the user client through the tcp socket.
      Parameters:
      command - A JsonObject containing the command to send.

    • manageCommand

      private void manageCommand(com.google.gson.JsonObject command) throws IllegalMoveException
      Manages the user's command parsing and calls the "createGame(int playersNumber, boolean expertMode)" method or "searchGame(String gameCode)" method if requested.
      Parameters:
      command - The command to manage.
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - Thrown if the player wants to do something illegal.

    • manageEnterGame

      private void manageEnterGame(com.google.gson.JsonObject command)
      Manages the "enterGame" command.
      Parameters:
      command - The command to manage.

    • manageLogin

      private void manageLogin(com.google.gson.JsonObject command)
      Manages the "login" command.
      Parameters:
      command - The command to manage.

    • manageGameCommand

      private void manageGameCommand(com.google.gson.JsonObject command) throws IllegalMoveException
      Manages the "command" command.
      Parameters:
      command - The command to manage.
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - Thrown if the command cannot be executed.

    • disconnected

      public void disconnected()
      Manages the user disconnection after a network problem.

    • isLogged

      private boolean isLogged()
      Returns the boolean second of logged attribute.
      Returns:
      True if the user has successfully logged into a game, false otherwise.

    • setLogged

      private void setLogged(boolean status)
      Sets the logged attribute to the given status.
      Parameters:
      status - The new logged second.

    • removeFromGame

      private void removeFromGame()
      If the user was in a game, s/he's removed from the game and the username is reset.
